/*eslint-disable*/ import React,{useEffect,useState} from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { collection, onSnapshot } from "@firebase/firestore"; import db from './firestore'; import IndexNavbar from "components/Navbars/IndexNavbar.js"; import Footer from "components/Footers/Footer.js"; import { white } from "tailwindcss/colors"; export default function Index() { const [gettoken,settoken]=useState(""); const [getcheck,setcheck]=useState(false); var x=window.location.pathname.substr(9,); console.log("x = ",x); var token=""; useEffect(() => { onSnapshot(collection(db,"Users"),(snapshot)=>{ console.log(snapshot.docs.map((doc) =>{ var alert=doc.data()['allowAlert']; if(doc.id==x && alert==true){ token=doc.data()['token']; settoken(token); setcheck(false); } })); }); },[gettoken]); if(getcheck == false){ setcheck(true); console.log("token = ",gettoken); const requestOptions = { method: 'POST', headers : { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Authorization': 'key=AAAAwLjkaQQ:APA91bGGODgz8-PBAGbOgvBw_I6wzxHj6JHnsmhIn1MST0a7Eoz6YvyBU2FLuR_lFIxrSAzHeeqKVrhsQKaY5pp2wPCfzLjUFsLS_gb0PwOeaBIYfsYEQe7k0G6Smuw-ZTFsChUPa42N', }, body: JSON.stringify({ 'notification':{ 'body': 'Somebody just scanned your doorbell', 'title': 'You have a visitor!', }, 'priority': 'high', 'data': { 'click_action': 'FLUTTER_NOTIFICATION_CLICK', 'id': '1', 'status': 'done', }, 'to': gettoken }) }; fetch('https://fcm.googleapis.com/fcm/send', requestOptions) .then(response => console.log("response",response.text())) .then(data => console.log("data",data)); } return ( <>
